“Super efficient” and “team-player” are two words that come to mind when I think of Jennifer!Jennifer and I came onto a project together that was always experiencing a lot of turnover in internal and external team members, which was causing the project to always be over-budget. Jennifer saw the opportunity for someone to step in and help “right the ship”. She helped create a sense of “team” by listening and implementing the suggestions of her team and we were able to get a handle on all the moving parts in this project. In the end, we gained the trust of our client and got the budget under control. Who doesn’t want that? I love that Jennifer is always up for the challenge and works at a high-level of personal responsibility and accountability. However, she never forgets to acknowledge the team around her and their contribution to her success! I am gonna miss working with her! Jennifer is an amazing addition to any company that she is a part of and will continue to be for a long time to come! This woman is going places!

Rhonda Donnelly
Business Analyst at meltmedia
September 24, 2015, Rhonda worked with Jennifer in the same group

Rhonda was a true source of knowledge and real key player on one of the more complex accounts/projects I was managing at meltmedia. I inherited the project after multiple reorgs, on both the client and internal side, and Rhonda was the saving grace that took the time to make sure I understood the technicalities, in addition to the politics, that drove many of the decisions on this specific account. Rhonda is a true business professional who understands not just the technical components of a project, but also takes the time to understand the business needs and drivers. She is proactive with providing the appropriate business solutions and planning ahead for risk. In addition to Rhonda's strong technical skills, she is also a great team leader and mentor. She will step up when needed and provide direction if she foresees gaps that impact the project's success. Rhonda is truly committed to making sure deliverables meet and/or exceed their requirements.  It was a pleasure not only working with Rhonda, but learning from her, as she is a true professional and impactful team member. Any team lucky enough to have her onboard is sure to be in great hands!

summary: Jennifer is an associate with over 6 years of experience in digital marketing and technology related projects. She has proven success in numerous roles in project and account management. She has extensive experience in project execution from inception through production deliverables, leading requirement gathering sessions and translating requirements to internal and external teams. Her experience includes work in retail, biotech/pharmaceutical, healthcare, utility and professional services industries. Jennifer’s skills include:● Project management and program management● Digital strategy, transformation and execution● Business analysis and process design● Vendor management● Technology – IT strategy and planning● Operations and training● Team leadership and executive communication●  PMP License: 4486096E1
